column2: Encourage mentors to collaborate with mentees on addressing bugs or issues.

column3: explain what you've tried when asking for help

column2: Encourage senior developers to answer questions of newcomers
Clearly communicate unresolved issues to the developers
Set expectations and needs early: Show newcomers what is expected from them
column4: and what skills and level of expertise they need to have (what programming languages and technologies are used by the project
column5: etc.). Place this information somewhere that newcomers access early in their journey (check issue comments under: Issue tag: “good first issue”)

column2: Keep the community informed about decisions.
